name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EC Solver: Auto Recognition and Bypass
name.ru: EC Solver: Обход и Авто Ввод Капчи

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EndCaptcha Solver plugin allows you to automatically solve CAPTCHAs found on any webpage.
short.es: La extensión para resolver automáticalmente los CAPTCHAs en cualqer página web.
short.ru: Этот плагин помогает решать капчи на страницах сайтов.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates CAPTCHA solving on any webpage using End Captcha.

Save time and frustration dealing with image or audio recognition captchas. EndCaptcha eliminates the need for manual form filling and guesswork to prove your humanity online.
